H0.text: who is the newly elected governor of california. Gavin Newsom

H1.text: who is the newly elected governor of california. Antonio Villaraigosa

H2.text: who is the newly elected governor of california. Kamala Harris

H3.text: who is the newly elected governor of california. Jerry Brown

A4.text: Newsom was elected governor of California in 2018 and reelected in 2022.

A5.text: Newsom has faced criticism for his personal behavior and leadership style during the COVID-19 pandemic, which contributed to an unsuccessful recall effort in 2021.

A6.text: In June 2018, Villaraigosa came in third in the blanket primary election, losing to Gavin Newsom and John Cox.
